# Who
I am Gen-Chang Hsu, a young budding scientist with a broad interest in ecology and evolutionary biology as well as data science, especially data visualization. Check out [my website](https://genchanghsu.github.io/){target="_blank"} for more information!

# What
This blog is a place for everything related to ggplots and ggplot extensions: proper usage of geoms and scales, handy tips for customizing themes and legends, nice features of extension packages, and so on so forth. In each post, I'll explore a graphic topic/issue in depth and provide some worked examples to show you how to make the most out of ggplots.

# Why
For fun and enjoyment, for learning and practice, for brainstorming and communication, for achievement and satisfaction, for...
